instructions: Put the dinner fork on the left lower side of the table cloth with the tines pointing up
put the dinner knife on the right lower side of the table cloth with the blade facing up
place the salad fork to the left of and parallel to the dinner fork
place the salad knife to the right of and parallel to the dinner knife
place the soup spoon to the right of and parallel to the salad knife
place the dessert spoon on the top center, with the bowl facing to the left
move the dessert spoon to the left of and parallel to the soup spoon
Place the dessert spoon in the top center with the bowl facing left
place the dinner plate on the bottom, between the dinner fork and the dinner knife
place the bread plate on the top left corner above the forks and left of the dessert spoon
place the butter knife on the top of the bread plate with the blade facing downward and left
place the wine glass above the soup spoon
place the water glass above the dinner plate and left of the wine glass
place the napkin in the center of the dinner plate
